name: Service Virtual Local Area Network Activity
title: S-VACT
definition: Identifies the activity requested for the S-VLAN.
validEntryNotes: Use of this field is based on customer provider negotiations.
Entry of “N” shall be used when adding a new S-VLAN. An entry of “N” is not valid when UACT is “D”.
Entry of “D” shall be used when removing an existing S-VLAN. An entry of “D” is not valid when the UACT is “N”.

Entry of “E” shall be used for those providers that require a reiteration of all existing S-VLANs that will be retained, otherwise existing S-VLANs are retained by default. An entry of “E” is not valid when the UACT is “N” or “D”.
When changing a S-VLAN from one value to another, an entry of “N” shall be used for the S-VLAN to be added and an entry of “D” shall be used for the S-VLAN to be removed.
usageNotes: Optional when the associated S-VLAN field is populated, otherwise prohibited.
